alert.note: Alert for Bradford; Eastern Alachua; Union; Western Alachua; Western Clay (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Bradford, central Alachua, south central Union and southwestern Clay Counties through 830 PM EDT... At 800 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over University Of Florida, or over Gainesville, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Gainesville, Alachua, University Of Florida, Orange Heights, Gainesville Airport, Newnans Lake, Waldo, Hampton, La Crosse and Brooker. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Bradford; Eastern Alachua; Union; Western Alachua; Western Clay
